Then<S>1161</S> said<S>2036</S> the high priest<S>749</S>, Are<S>1487</S> <S>686</S> <S>2192</S> these things<S>5023</S> so<S>3779</S>?
And<S>1161</S> he said<S>5346</S>, Men<S>435</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, and<S>2532</S> fathers<S>3962</S>, hearken<S>191</S>; The God<S>2316</S> of glory<S>1391</S> appeared<S>3700</S> unto our<S>2257</S> father<S>3962</S> Abraham<S>11</S>, when he was<S>5607</S> in<S>1722</S> Mesopotamia<S>3318</S>, before<S>4250</S> <S>2228</S> he<S>846</S> dwelt<S>2730</S> in<S>1722</S> Charran<S>5488</S>,
And<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, Get thee<S>1831</S> out of<S>1537</S> thy<S>4675</S> country<S>1093</S>, and<S>2532</S> from<S>1537</S> thy<S>4675</S> kindred<S>4772</S>, and<S>2532</S> come<S>1204</S> into<S>1519</S> the land<S>1093</S> which<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> I shall shew<S>1166</S> thee<S>4671</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> came he<S>1831</S> out of<S>1537</S> the land<S>1093</S> of the Chaldaeans<S>5466</S>, and dwelt<S>2730</S> in<S>1722</S> Charran<S>5488</S>: and from thence<S>2547</S>, when<S>3326</S> his<S>846</S> father<S>3962</S> was dead<S>599</S>, he removed<S>3351</S> him<S>846</S> into<S>1519</S> this<S>5026</S> land<S>1093</S>, wherein<S>1519</S> <S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> now<S>3568</S> dwell<S>2730</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he gave<S>1325</S> him<S>846</S> none<S>3756</S> inheritance<S>2817</S> in<S>1722</S> it<S>846</S>, no, not<S>3761</S> so much as to set<S>968</S> his foot<S>4228</S> on<S>968</S>: yet<S>2532</S> he promised<S>1861</S> that he would give<S>1325</S> it<S>846</S> to him<S>846</S> for<S>1519</S> a possession<S>2697</S>, and<S>2532</S> to his<S>846</S> seed<S>4690</S> after<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>, when as yet he<S>846</S> had<S>5607</S> no<S>3756</S> child<S>5043</S>.
And<S>1161</S> God<S>2316</S> spake<S>2980</S> on this wise<S>3779</S>, That<S>3754</S> his<S>846</S> seed<S>4690</S> should<S>2071</S> sojourn<S>3941</S> in<S>1722</S> a strange<S>245</S> land<S>1093</S>; and<S>2532</S> that they should bring<S>1402</S> them<S>846</S> into bondage<S>1402</S>, and<S>2532</S> entreat them evil<S>2559</S> four hundred<S>5071</S> years<S>2094</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the nation<S>1484</S> to whom<S>3739</S> <S>1437</S> they shall be in bondage<S>1398</S> will<S>2919</S> I<S>1473</S> judge<S>2919</S>, said<S>2036</S> God<S>2316</S>: and<S>2532</S> after<S>3326</S> that<S>5023</S> shall they come forth<S>1831</S>, and<S>2532</S> serve<S>3000</S> me<S>3427</S> in<S>1722</S> this<S>5129</S> place<S>5117</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he gave<S>1325</S> him<S>846</S> the covenant<S>1242</S> of circumcision<S>4061</S>: and<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> Abraham begat<S>1080</S> Isaac<S>2464</S>, and<S>2532</S> circumcised<S>4059</S> him<S>846</S> the eighth<S>3590</S> day<S>2250</S>; and<S>2532</S> Isaac<S>2464</S> begat Jacob<S>2384</S>; and<S>2532</S> Jacob<S>2384</S> begat the twelve<S>1427</S> patriarchs<S>3966</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the patriarchs<S>3966</S>, moved with envy<S>2206</S>, sold<S>591</S> Joseph<S>2501</S> into<S>1519</S> Egypt<S>125</S>: but<S>2532</S> God<S>2316</S> was<S>2258</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>,
And<S>2532</S> delivered<S>1807</S> him<S>846</S> out of<S>1537</S> all<S>3956</S> his<S>846</S> afflictions<S>2347</S>, and<S>2532</S> gave<S>1325</S> him<S>846</S> favour<S>5485</S> and<S>2532</S> wisdom<S>4678</S> in the sight<S>1726</S> of Pharaoh<S>5328</S> king<S>935</S> of Egypt<S>125</S>; and<S>2532</S> he made<S>2525</S> him<S>846</S> governor<S>2233</S> over<S>1909</S> Egypt<S>125</S> and<S>2532</S> all<S>3650</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3624</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> there came<S>2064</S> a dearth<S>3042</S> over<S>1909</S> all<S>3650</S> the land<S>1093</S> of Egypt<S>125</S> and<S>2532</S> Chanaan<S>5477</S>, and<S>2532</S> great<S>3173</S> affliction<S>2347</S>: and<S>2532</S> our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S> found<S>2147</S> no<S>3756</S> sustenance<S>5527</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when Jacob<S>2384</S> heard<S>191</S> that there was<S>5607</S> corn<S>4621</S> in<S>1722</S> Egypt<S>125</S>, he sent out<S>1821</S> our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S> first<S>4412</S>.
And<S>2532</S> at<S>1722</S> the second<S>1208</S> time Joseph<S>2501</S> was made known<S>319</S> to his<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S>; and<S>2532</S> Joseph's<S>2501</S> kindred<S>1085</S> was made<S>1096</S> known<S>5318</S> unto Pharaoh<S>5328</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> sent<S>649</S> Joseph<S>2501</S>, and called<S>3333</S> his<S>846</S> father<S>3962</S> Jacob<S>2384</S> to him, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> his<S>846</S> kindred<S>4772</S>,<S>1722</S> threescore<S>1440</S> and fifteen<S>4002</S> souls<S>5590</S>.
So<S>1161</S> Jacob<S>2384</S> went down<S>2597</S> into<S>1519</S> Egypt<S>125</S>, and<S>2532</S> died<S>5053</S>, he<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S>,
And<S>2532</S> were carried over<S>3346</S> into<S>1519</S> Sychem<S>4966</S>, and<S>2532</S> laid<S>5087</S> in<S>1722</S> the sepulchre<S>3418</S> that<S>3739</S> Abraham<S>11</S> bought<S>5608</S> for a sum<S>5092</S> of money<S>694</S> of<S>3844</S> the sons<S>5207</S> of Emmor<S>1697</S> the father<S>3588</S> of Sychem<S>4966</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when<S>2531</S> the time<S>5550</S> of the promise<S>1860</S> drew nigh<S>1448</S>, which<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> had sworn<S>3660</S> to Abraham<S>11</S>, the people<S>2992</S> grew<S>837</S> and<S>2532</S> multiplied<S>4129</S> in<S>1722</S> Egypt<S>125</S>,
Till<S>891</S> <S>3739</S> another<S>2087</S> king<S>935</S> arose<S>450</S>, which<S>3739</S> knew<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> Joseph<S>2501</S>.
The same<S>3778</S> dealt subtilly<S>2686</S> with our<S>2257</S> kindred<S>1085</S>, and evil entreated<S>2559</S> our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S>, so that<S>4160</S> they cast out<S>1570</S> their<S>846</S> young children<S>1025</S>, to the end<S>1519</S> they might<S>2225</S> not<S>3361</S> live<S>2225</S>.
In<S>1722</S> which<S>3739</S> time<S>2540</S> Moses<S>3475</S> was born<S>1080</S>, and<S>2532</S> was<S>2258</S> exceeding<S>2316</S> fair<S>791</S>, and<S>3739</S> nourished up<S>397</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> father's<S>3962</S> house<S>3624</S> three<S>5140</S> months<S>3376</S>: <sup>exceeding fair: or, fair to God</sup>
And<S>1161</S> when he<S>846</S> was cast out<S>1620</S>, Pharaoh's<S>5328</S> daughter<S>2364</S> took<S>337</S> him<S>846</S> up<S>337</S>, and<S>2532</S> nourished<S>397</S> him<S>846</S> for<S>1519</S> her own<S>1438</S> son<S>5207</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Moses<S>3475</S> was learned<S>3811</S> in all<S>3956</S> the wisdom<S>4678</S> of the Egyptians<S>124</S>, and<S>1161</S> was<S>2258</S> mighty<S>1415</S> in<S>1722</S> words<S>3056</S> and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> deeds<S>2041</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when<S>5613</S> he<S>846</S> was full<S>4137</S> forty years<S>5063</S> old<S>5550</S>, it came<S>305</S> into<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> heart<S>2588</S> to visit<S>1980</S> his<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S> the children<S>5207</S> of Israel<S>2474</S>.
And<S>2532</S> seeing<S>1492</S> one<S>5100</S> of them suffer wrong<S>91</S>, he defended<S>292</S> him, and<S>2532</S> avenged<S>1557</S> <S>4160</S> him that was oppressed<S>2669</S>, and smote<S>3960</S> the Egyptian<S>124</S>:
For<S>1161</S> he supposed<S>3543</S> his<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S> would have understood<S>4920</S> how<S>3754</S> that God<S>2316</S> by<S>1223</S> his<S>846</S> hand<S>5495</S> would deliver<S>1325</S> <S>4991</S> them<S>846</S>: but<S>1161</S> they understood<S>4920</S> not<S>3756</S>. <sup>For: or, Now</sup>
And<S>5037</S> the next<S>1966</S> day<S>2250</S> he shewed himself<S>3700</S> unto them<S>846</S> as they strove<S>3164</S>, and<S>2532</S> would have set<S>4900</S> them<S>846</S> at<S>1519</S> one again<S>1515</S>, saying<S>2036</S>, Sirs<S>435</S>, ye<S>5210</S> are<S>2075</S> brethren<S>80</S>; why<S>2444</S> do ye wrong<S>91</S> one to another<S>240</S>?
But<S>1161</S> he that did<S>91</S> his neighbour<S>4139</S> wrong<S>91</S> thrust<S>683</S> him<S>846</S> away<S>683</S>, saying<S>2036</S>, Who<S>5101</S> made<S>2525</S> thee<S>4571</S> a ruler<S>758</S> and<S>2532</S> a judge<S>1348</S> over<S>1909</S> us<S>2248</S>?
Wilt<S>3361</S> <S>2309</S> thou<S>4771</S> kill<S>337</S> me<S>3165</S>, as<S>3739</S> <S>5158</S> thou diddest<S>337</S> the Egyptian<S>124</S> yesterday<S>5504</S>?
Then<S>1161</S> fled<S>5343</S> Moses<S>3475</S> at<S>1722</S> this<S>5129</S> saying<S>3056</S>, and<S>2532</S> was<S>1096</S> a stranger<S>3941</S> in<S>1722</S> the land<S>1093</S> of Madian<S>3099</S>, where<S>3757</S> he begat<S>1080</S> two<S>1417</S> sons<S>5207</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when forty<S>5062</S> years<S>2094</S> were expired<S>4137</S>, there appeared<S>3700</S> to him<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S> of mount<S>3735</S> Sina<S>4614</S> an angel<S>32</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> in<S>1722</S> a flame<S>5395</S> of fire<S>4442</S> in a bush<S>942</S>.
When<S>1161</S> Moses<S>3475</S> saw<S>1492</S> it, he wondered<S>2296</S> at the sight<S>3705</S>: and<S>1161</S> as he<S>846</S> drew near<S>4334</S> to behold<S>2657</S> it, the voice<S>5456</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> came<S>1096</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>,
Saying, I<S>1473</S> am the God<S>2316</S> of thy<S>4675</S> fathers<S>3962</S>, the God<S>2316</S> of Abraham<S>11</S>, and<S>2532</S> the God<S>2316</S> of Isaac<S>2464</S>, and<S>2532</S> the God<S>2316</S> of Jacob<S>2384</S>. Then<S>1161</S> Moses<S>3475</S> trembled<S>1096</S> <S>1790</S>, and durst<S>5111</S> not<S>3756</S> behold<S>2657</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> said<S>2036</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> to him<S>846</S>, Put off<S>3089</S> thy shoes<S>5266</S> from thy<S>4675</S> feet<S>4228</S>: for<S>1063</S> the place<S>5117</S> where<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> thou standest<S>2476</S> is<S>2076</S> holy<S>40</S> ground<S>1093</S>.
I have seen<S>1492</S>, I have seen<S>1492</S> the affliction<S>2561</S> of my<S>3450</S> people<S>2992</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> Egypt<S>125</S>, and<S>2532</S> I have heard<S>191</S> their<S>846</S> groaning<S>4726</S>, and<S>2532</S> am come down<S>2597</S> to deliver<S>1807</S> them<S>846</S>. And<S>2532</S> now<S>3568</S> come<S>1204</S>, I will send<S>649</S> thee<S>4571</S> into<S>1519</S> Egypt<S>125</S>.
This<S>5126</S> Moses<S>3475</S> whom<S>3739</S> they refused<S>720</S>, saying<S>2036</S>, Who<S>5101</S> made<S>2525</S> thee<S>4571</S> a ruler<S>758</S> and<S>2532</S> a judge<S>1348</S>? the same<S>5126</S> did God<S>2316</S> send<S>649</S> to be a ruler<S>758</S> and<S>2532</S> a deliverer<S>3086</S> by<S>1722</S> the hand<S>5495</S> of the angel<S>32</S> which<S>3588</S> appeared<S>3700</S> to him<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> the bush<S>942</S>.
He<S>3778</S> brought<S>1806</S> them<S>846</S> out<S>1806</S>, after that he had shewed<S>4160</S> wonders<S>5059</S> and<S>2532</S> signs<S>4592</S> in<S>1722</S> the land<S>1093</S> of Egypt<S>125</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the Red<S>2063</S> sea<S>2281</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S> forty<S>5062</S> years<S>2094</S>.
This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> that Moses<S>3475</S>, which<S>3588</S> said<S>2036</S> unto the children<S>5207</S> of Israel<S>2474</S>, A prophet<S>4396</S> shall<S>450</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> your<S>5216</S> God<S>2316</S> raise up<S>450</S> unto you<S>5213</S> of<S>1537</S> your<S>5216</S> brethren<S>80</S>, like<S>5613</S> unto me<S>1691</S>; him<S>846</S> shall ye hear<S>191</S>. <sup>like: or, as myself</sup>
This<S>3778</S> is he<S>2076</S>, that was<S>1096</S> in<S>1722</S> the church<S>1577</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S> with<S>3326</S> the angel<S>32</S> which<S>3588</S> spake<S>2980</S> to him<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> the mount<S>3735</S> Sina<S>4614</S>, and<S>2532</S> with our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S>: who<S>3739</S> received<S>1209</S> the lively<S>2198</S> oracles<S>3051</S> to give<S>1325</S> unto us<S>2254</S>:
To whom<S>3739</S> our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S> would<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S> obey<S>1096</S> <S>5255</S>, but<S>235</S> thrust him from them<S>683</S>, and<S>2532</S> in their<S>846</S> hearts<S>2588</S> turned back again<S>4762</S> into<S>1519</S> Egypt<S>125</S>,
Saying<S>2036</S> unto Aaron<S>2</S>, Make<S>4160</S> us<S>2254</S> gods<S>2316</S> to<S>3739</S> go before<S>4313</S> us<S>2257</S>: for<S>1063</S> as for this<S>3778</S> Moses<S>3475</S>, which<S>3739</S> brought<S>1806</S> us<S>2248</S> out of<S>1537</S> the land<S>1093</S> of Egypt<S>125</S>, we wot<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> what<S>5101</S> is become<S>1096</S> of him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they made a calf<S>3447</S> in<S>1722</S> those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S>, and<S>2532</S> offered<S>321</S> sacrifice<S>2378</S> unto the idol<S>1497</S>, and<S>2532</S> rejoiced<S>2165</S> in<S>1722</S> the works<S>2041</S> of their own<S>846</S> hands<S>5495</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> God<S>2316</S> turned<S>4762</S>, and<S>2532</S> gave<S>3860</S> them<S>846</S> up<S>3860</S> to worship<S>3000</S> the host<S>4756</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>; as it<S>2531</S> is written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> the book<S>976</S> of the prophets<S>4396</S>, O ye house<S>3624</S> of Israel<S>2474</S>, have ye offered<S>3361</S> <S>4374</S> to me<S>3427</S> slain beasts<S>4968</S> and<S>2532</S> sacrifices<S>2378</S> by the space of forty<S>5062</S> years<S>2094</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S>?
Yea<S>2532</S>, ye took up<S>353</S> the tabernacle<S>4633</S> of Moloch<S>3434</S>, and<S>2532</S> the star<S>798</S> of your<S>5216</S> god<S>2316</S> Remphan<S>4481</S>, figures<S>5179</S> which<S>3739</S> ye made<S>4160</S> to worship<S>4352</S> them<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> I will carry<S>3351</S> you<S>5209</S> away<S>3351</S> beyond<S>1900</S> Babylon<S>897</S>.
Our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S> had<S>2258</S> the tabernacle<S>4633</S> of witness<S>3142</S> <S>1722</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S>, as<S>2531</S> he had appointed<S>1299</S>, speaking<S>2980</S> unto Moses<S>3475</S>, that he should make<S>4160</S> it<S>846</S> according<S>2596</S> to the fashion<S>5179</S> that<S>3739</S> he had seen<S>3708</S>. <sup>speaking: or, who spake</sup>
Which<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S> that came<S>1237</S> after brought in<S>1521</S> with<S>3326</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> into<S>1722</S> the possession<S>2697</S> of the Gentiles<S>1484</S>, whom<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> drave out<S>1856</S> before<S>575</S> the face<S>4383</S> of our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S>, unto<S>2193</S> the days<S>2250</S> of David<S>1138</S>; <sup>that: or, having received</sup>
Who<S>3739</S> found<S>2147</S> favour<S>5485</S> before<S>1799</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> desired<S>154</S> to find<S>2147</S> a tabernacle<S>4638</S> for the God<S>2316</S> of Jacob<S>2384</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Solomon<S>4672</S> built<S>3618</S> him<S>846</S> an house<S>3624</S>.
Howbeit<S>235</S> the most High<S>5310</S> dwelleth<S>2730</S> not<S>3756</S> in<S>1722</S> temples<S>3485</S> made with hands<S>5499</S>; as<S>2531</S> saith<S>3004</S> the prophet<S>4396</S>,
Heaven<S>3772</S> is my<S>3427</S> throne<S>2362</S>, and<S>1161</S> earth<S>1093</S> is my<S>3450</S> footstool<S>4228</S> <S>5286</S>: what<S>4169</S> house<S>3624</S> will ye build<S>3618</S> me<S>3427</S>? saith<S>3004</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>: or<S>2228</S> what<S>5101</S> is the place<S>5117</S> of my<S>3450</S> rest<S>2663</S>?
Hath<S>4160</S> not<S>3780</S> my<S>3450</S> hand<S>5495</S> made<S>4160</S> all<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S>?
Ye stiffnecked<S>4644</S> and<S>2532</S> uncircumcised<S>564</S> in heart<S>2588</S> and<S>2532</S> ears<S>3775</S>, ye<S>5210</S> do<S>496</S> always<S>104</S> resist<S>496</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>: as<S>5613</S> your<S>5216</S> fathers<S>3962</S> did, so<S>2532</S> do ye<S>5210</S>.
Which<S>5101</S> of the prophets<S>4396</S> have<S>1377</S> not<S>3756</S> your<S>5216</S> fathers<S>3962</S> persecuted<S>1377</S>? and<S>2532</S> they have slain<S>615</S> them which<S>3588</S> shewed before<S>4293</S> of<S>4012</S> the coming<S>1660</S> of the Just One<S>1342</S>; of whom<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> have been<S>1096</S> now<S>3568</S> the betrayers<S>4273</S> and<S>2532</S> murderers<S>5406</S>:
Who<S>3748</S> have received<S>2983</S> the law<S>3551</S> by<S>1519</S> the disposition<S>1296</S> of angels<S>32</S>, and<S>2532</S> have<S>5442</S> not<S>3756</S> kept<S>5442</S> it.
When<S>1161</S> they heard<S>191</S> these things<S>5023</S>, they were cut<S>1282</S> to the heart<S>2588</S> <S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> they gnashed<S>1031</S> on<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S> with their teeth<S>3599</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he, being<S>5225</S> full<S>4134</S> of the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>, looked up stedfastly<S>816</S> into<S>1519</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, and saw<S>1492</S> the glory<S>1391</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> standing<S>2476</S> on<S>1537</S> the right hand<S>1188</S> of God<S>2316</S>,
And<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, Behold<S>2400</S>, I see<S>2334</S> the heavens<S>3772</S> opened<S>455</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> standing<S>2476</S> on<S>1537</S> the right hand<S>1188</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> they cried out<S>2896</S> with a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S>, and stopped<S>4912</S> their<S>846</S> ears<S>3775</S>, and<S>2532</S> ran<S>3729</S> upon<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S> with one accord<S>3661</S>,
And<S>2532</S> cast<S>1544</S> him out of<S>1854</S> the city<S>4172</S>, and stoned<S>3036</S> him: and<S>2532</S> the witnesses<S>3144</S> laid down<S>659</S> their<S>846</S> clothes<S>2440</S> at<S>3844</S> a young man's<S>3494</S> feet<S>4228</S>, whose name was<S>2564</S> Saul<S>4569</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they stoned<S>3036</S> Stephen<S>4736</S>, calling upon<S>1941</S> God, and<S>2532</S> saying<S>3004</S>, Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, receive<S>1209</S> my<S>3450</S> spirit<S>4151</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he kneeled down<S>5087</S> <S>1119</S>, and cried<S>2896</S> with a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, lay<S>2476</S> not<S>3361</S> this<S>5026</S> sin<S>266</S> to their<S>846</S> charge. And<S>2532</S> when he had said<S>2036</S> this<S>5124</S>, he fell asleep<S>2837</S>.
